query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:NOTIFICATIONS:X.NOTIFICATION_CODE:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:NOTIFICATIONS:X.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:NOTIFICATIONS:X.LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT cn.notification_code AS notification_code, cn.last_updated_date AS last_updated_date, csu.user_name AS last_updated_by FROM cmn_notifications cn LEFT JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = cn.last_updated_by WHERE cn.notification_code NOT LIKE ('BPM_DEF_STEP%') AND EXISTS ( SELECT sq.notification_code, sq.last_updated_date FROM ( SELECT notification_code, MAX(last_updated_date) AS last_updated_date FROM cmn_notifications WHERE notification_code NOT LIKE ('BPM_DEF_STEP%') GROUP BY notification_code ) sq WHERE sq.notification_code = cn.notification_code AND sq.last_updated_date = cn.last_updated_date ) ) x WHERE @FILTER@
